name: Reality Tower
description:
Reality Tower is a fast paced, parkour FPS, starring Damien Longlegs, an anthropomorphic frog who used to be a star athlete! 

Owned by the megalomaniac CEO Mr Galaxian, the Reality Tower is a high rise with twists, turns and constantly shifting environments, designed to challenge even the most skilled runners. Offering his fortune to the first person to reach the top of his tower, Mr Galaxian opens it up to prospective racers for his entertainment! Damien enters the race hoping to use the fortune to pay for the university tuition fees of his many, many tadpoles. Can he make it to the top?

Run, jump, wallrun and shoot your way past the turrets designed to stop you, and climb up the art deco themed Reality Tower to claim your fortune!

How to Play:

Move Forward – W                                       Jump - Space

Move Backward – S                                      Jetpack - Left Shift

Strafe Left – A                                                  Aim/Look - Mouse

Strafe Right – D                                               Aim Shoot - Left Mouse Button
